snippet: The Johns Hopkins men's lacrosse team has never lost an N.C.A.A. tournament home game in the 12 seasons Dave Pietramala has been the coach.
abstract: The Johns Hopkins men's lacrosse team has never lost an N.C.A.A. tournament home game in the 12 seasons Dave Pietramala has been the coach.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. Preview: At Hopkins There Is No Welcome Mat
